lines.transliteration_english: Bhagat Vachhal Souni Hot Ho Niraas Ridai , Patit Paavan Souni Aasaa Ur Dhaari Haoun ?

Shabad OS B.translation: O Lord, when I hear that you are beloved of those who worship you all the time, I, who is bereft of your worship become sad and disappointed. But on hearing that you forgive sinners and make them pious, a ray of hope kindles in my heart.

lines.transliteration_english: Antarajaamee Souni Kanpat Hau Antaragati , Deen Ko Daiaal Souni Bhai Bhram Taar Haoun ?

Shabad OS B.translation: I, the evil-doer, when hear that you are knower of innate feelings and thoughts of everyone, I tremble within. But hearing that you are clement on poor and destitutes, I shed all my fears.
